tool.name: Get list of markers
tool.help:
This tool returns a table of the headers of a set of FCS files.
-----
**Input files**
This tool requires collections of FCS files as input.
**Output file**
The output file is a table listing the markers and channels for each file.
-----
**Example**
*File1*::
Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 34 45 12 33 65 10
*File2*::
Marker4 Marker5 Marker3 19 62 98 12 36 58
*Output*::
File1 channels Channel1 Channel2 Channel3 File2 channels Channel4 Channel5 Channel3 File1 markers Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 File2 markers Marker4 Marker5 Marker3
